medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent stress cardiomyopathy after using Sudafed PE.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient, a 63-year-old woman, developed an upper respiratory infection and began taking Sudafed PE one week prior to the event. She experienced unremitting chest pain, ST-segment elevations, and elevated troponin levels, leading to hospitalization. This situation mirrors a prior hospitalization 4 years earlier for similar symptoms and was also linked to Sudafed PE usage, during which she was under emotional stress related to family health issues.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and prior tobacco use.
